title: Burke Mountain Middle/Secondary School
summary: The Burke Mountain Middle/Secondary School is a new combined middle and secondary school under construction in northeast Coquitlam, British Columbia. The project includes a 1,000-seat school for students in Grades 6-12, a neighborhood learning centre, and a 3.6-hectare community park. The school is funded by $135 million from the provincial government and $25 million from the Coquitlam School District. Construction began in 2024, with an expected completion date of September 2026.
